entities.name: xenophilius lovegood
entities.description: Xenophilius Lovegood is mentioned as the owner of an Erumpent horn. He is described as having a 'mullish look upon his face' and speaking in a dogmatic tone.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as disagreeing with Harry's statement. She recognizes the Erumpent horn and warns Xenophilius about its danger.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as making a statement that Hermione disagrees with. He seems embarrassed and tries to change the subject.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as asking how Xenophilius knows it's an Erumpent horn. He edges away from the horn due to its danger.

entities.name: erumpent horn
entities.description: The Erumpent horn is described as a Class B Tradeable Material and an extraordinarily dangerous thing to have in a house. Hermione recognizes it by its grooved markings.

entities.name: crumple-horned snorkack
entities.description: Xenophilius mentions the Crumple-Horned Snorkack as a shy and highly magical creature, but Hermione corrects him that it's actually an Erumpent horn.

entities.name: fantastic beasts and where to find them
entities.description: The book 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' is mentioned as having a description of the Erumpent horn.

relationships.description: Xenophilius Lovegood owns an Erumpent horn, which he bought two weeks ago.
Hermione recognizes the Erumpent horn by its grooved markings and warns Xenophilius about its danger.
Xenophilius mistakenly identifies the Erumpent horn as a Crumple-Horned Snorkack.
